title: Expert Analysis of Top Black Friday Deals in the UK
summary: This article provides a detailed overview of the best Black Friday deals currently available in the UK, curated by a senior deals editor at TechRadar. With nearly a decade of experience covering major sales events, the author has identified over 100 bargains across categories such as TVs, laptops, appliances, headphones, and games consoles. Key highlights include discounted products from brands like Sony, Ninja, and Garmin, with specific examples like the Sony WF-C700N earbuds at Â£55 and the PlayStation 5 Pro at a record-low price. The article emphasizes the early start of this year's Black Friday sales and aims to guide consumers in making informed purchases by highlighting tested and loved products. It also mentions affiliate commissions, indicating how the site earns revenue. Overall, it serves as a practical resource for shoppers looking to capitalize on seasonal discounts and avoid missing out on limited-time offers.

background_read: Black Friday originated in the United States as a post-Thanksgiving sales event and has spread globally, including the UK, where it now spans several days or weeks. It involves retailers offering deep discounts to boost sales, often on electronics and appliances. TechRadar is a reputable online publication focused on technology news and reviews, and its deals editors use their expertise to curate lists based on product testing and market analysis. Understanding affiliate marketing is key; it allows sites to earn commissions without affecting product prices for consumers.
